title: Sketchbook Folio, "The Madonna and Child in Glory, Study after Dosso Dossi", 1821–22
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, over traces of black chalk on white heavy wove paper
inscribed: in pen and brown ink at lower left: Dossi Dosso Fano 29
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: At center, Madonna and Child seated on clouds, supported by three putti, with two other putti flying at upper right and left; Child holds crown and palm of martyrdom. Below suggestion of walled city.
